text: Atomic Homefront is a 2017 documentary film about the effects of radioactive waste stored in West Lake Landfill in St. Louis County, Missouri. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 documentary films Category:2017 films Category:Environmental impact of nuclear power Category:Hazardous waste Category:Radioactive waste Category:Radioactivity Category:St. Louis County, Missouri Category:American films Category:English- language films Category:HBO documentary films
title: Atomic Homefront
